content.rendered:
The Little Family Endowed Scholarship is available to traditional-age undergraduates with demonstrated financial need. The deadline to apply is October 25, 2024. To apply, complete the The Little Family Scholarship application.

The Sue Caple Memorial Award is available to traditional-age undergraduate business or marketing majors with demonstrated financial need.

In addition, there are outside scholarships and funds available. These are in addition to any financial aid provided by the University of La Verne and any scholarships that might be offered by the provider of the study abroad program that you select.

Top Choices

Benjamin A. Gilman International Scholarship Sponsored by the U.S. Department of State, Gilman Scholarships are available to students with Pell Grants.
Center for Global Education This website lists several resources.
EduPASS For international students studying in the U.S.
Fulbright Scholarship Scholarship winners can teach English abroad.
International Education Financial Aid
International Student Loan

Other Choices

These scholarships and loans vary from general to specific, depending on the program of study.

  • Diversity Abroad
  • Institute of International Education
  • Rotary International
  • IIEPassport
  • Rhodes Scholars

After Graduation

  • Boren Awards: Learn a defense-related foreign language abroad.
  • Fulbright Fellowship: Scholarship winners can teach English abroad.
